businessProfile.name: Slice Brothers Pizza
businessProfile.address: Midtown Global Market, 920 E Lake St #113, Minneapolis, MN 55407, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: Midtown Global Market, 920 E Lake St #113, Minneapolis, MN 55407, USA

reviews.text: Slice Brothers is good at any location. Pickup was easy at the Midtown global market location. BBQ chicken is a featured flavor right now and it was good. Pineapple Chicken slice was loaded with pineapple, which is much appreciated. We enjoyed our order.

Waited 10 minutes after we already waiting 20min for the order to be ready. We then got the wrong sized pizza so we waited another 40min for the right pizza. When we got home and the pizza we waited  over an hour for is completely RAW. We now have to cook the pizza at home (with no baking sheet). The workers couldn‚Äôt care less about this inconvenience and didn‚Äôt offer any type of discount, coupon for next time or nothing. This pizza is NOT cheap and yet it feels like after this experience it should be. Their NE location was good but it seems like it shut down. I will not be back until the NE location reopens and I strongly URGE you to do the same. Unless this type of experience sounds like fun to you.

We ordered 2 pepperoni pizzas through DoorDash. Our dasher notified us that when he arrived about , 30-40 minutes after we first ordered through the app, that they had not started our order and it would be 10-20 minutes until it was complete. Long after we ordered, we finally received our pizzas. One was barely edible and the other inedible as it was underbaked and was raw in places. We couldn‚Äôt even pick up a slice of pizza without the dough ripping since it was so raw. In order to even be edible, we would have  to cook the pizza in the oven.

We have been customers for years, but this is our final straw. The quality is so unpredictable and lately we are receiving more bad orders than good.

I will no longer be ordering from Slice Brothers.
Buyers beware.

I used to love Slice Brothers but not any more. I ordered pizzas for pickup via their web site on 8/23/25 and was disappointed to find their restaurant unstaffed and empty when I went to pick them up despite having the order confirmed and and charged to me. My messages to management via their web site and Toast Local app have had no response. When I went to their restaurant in person later in the week, an employee confirmed they were closed the whole day on 8/23/25 and wished me luck trying to get the charges refunded.

I really hate to do this, but they have left me no other choice. On 1/17/2025 I ordered delivery through their website. The delivery driver arrived carrying two pizzas SIDEWAYS in a plastic grocery bag. As you can imagine, the pizzas were a mangled mess. My kids would not eat it. Each slice was either naked or overloaded with cheese and toppings. They had sent an email asking how the delivery experience was. I provided feedback that it was terrible. I tried calling the restaurant but nobody has answered over the last 10 days. I sent an email on 1/21, with no response.

This pizza is delicious, so they get 1 star for that. The lack of accountability is insane.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

Their pickled pizza is the best! Never have had bad service either. Been here at least half a dozen times. Good atmosphere. Midtown Global Market is awesome and tons of other selections.

Slice Brothers is good at any location. Pickup was easy at the Midtown global market location. BBQ chicken is a featured flavor right now and it was good. Pineapple Chicken slice was loaded with pineapple, which is much appreciated. We enjoyed our order.
The food is generally very good, but the service from the staff is terrible, extremely rude when serving, change the staff because the truth is that they leave a bad image, especially of Latinos.

This is a sad version of pizza. It's nothing like NY pizza.
Terrible just terrible.

detailedReviews.text: Waited 10 minutes after we already waiting 20min for the order to be ready. We then got the wrong sized pizza so we waited another 40min for the right pizza. detailedReviews.text:

detailedReviews.text: I used to love Slice Brothers but not any more. detailedReviews.author: Nate Keller
detailedReviews.text: Their pickled pizza is the best! Never have had bad service either. Been here at least half a dozen times. Good atmosphere. Midtown Global Market is awesome and tons of other selections.

detailedReviews.author: Onyedimma Nwachuku
detailedReviews.text: Slice Brothers is good at any location. Pickup was easy at the Midtown global market location. BBQ chicken is a featured flavor right now and it was good. Pineapple Chicken slice was loaded with pineapple, which is much appreciated. We enjoyed our order.

detailedReviews.author: Froilan Cuervo
detailedReviews.text: The food is generally very good, but the service from the staff is terrible, extremely rude when serving, change the staff because the truth is that they leave a bad image, especially of Latinos.

detailedReviews.author: Sam Fischer
detailedReviews.text:
This is a sad version of pizza. It's nothing like NY pizza.
Terrible just terrible.

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Verdin
detailedReviews.text:
I really hate to do this, but they have left me no other choice. On 1/17/2025 I ordered delivery through their website. The delivery driver arrived carrying two pizzas SIDEWAYS in a plastic grocery bag. As you can imagine, the pizzas were a mangled mess. My kids would not eat it. Each slice was either naked or overloaded with cheese and toppings. They had sent an email asking how the delivery experience was. I provided feedback that it was terrible. I tried calling the restaurant but nobody has answered over the last 10 days. I sent an email on 1/21, with no response.

This pizza is delicious, so they get 1 star for that. The lack of accountability is insane.

detailedReviews.author: Ted Snyder
detailedReviews.text: The lady was so friendly taking an order for pizza. She even went the extra mile to do the top quality service. The food is great and affordable.

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Rud
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is very good, unfortunately their customer service is lacking. I ordered a 10 inch pizza for delivery which is about $14 (plus taxes and fees and tip). I received a slice of pizza instead, which is like $6. I spent a total of $23 on a pizza order for something that costs $6. I tried calling the store 4 times throughout the day to discuss and hopefully receive a partial refund or a voucher or something to make up for the order mistake and I was unable to reach anyone any of the times I called. I submitted a contact me request and have heard nothing. This was a week ago now. As good as the pizza is I will not be ordering from this store again.

detailedReviews.author: Susan Klein
detailedReviews.text: Tasty pizza but a bit pricey. The Dilli Pickle slice was tasty.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay Gauvitte
detailedReviews.text: We had a large order (12 pizzas) that we needed in a rush and ready before 12, and we were so greatful for Adam and the superior customer service he provided to ensure we had our pizzas hot and ready for our event.  Thank you for going the extra mile to meet our needs and exceed our expectations!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Alfaro
detailedReviews.text: Pizza = cardboard. Garlic Knots = purposeful false advertisement. I request a refund as soon as I saw them but was refused. The employee only said ‚Äúno‚Äù.

detailedReviews.author: Dane Turan
detailedReviews.text: This was at MOA location. The price was insane.  I had to give an email to order??? Why? Avoid if you are in any kind of rush. Pizza was ok but  it took 15min to get 2 slices while there was only one person ahead of me. The pizza slices I ordered were behind the glass already made but no one was there to serve it they didn‚Äôt give me a receipt they didn‚Äôt give me the drink I ordered. But I did have to tip them before I knew what I was getting into. Oh and of the two people who were hiding in the back when they did come out they looked upset like what? I tipped you. And I didn‚Äôt even speak to you. why are you mad? I would pay another 18$ to never have to eat here again.

detailedReviews.author: Rakel Rose
detailedReviews.text: I dream of the dill pickle pizza daily.

detailedReviews.author: Emmanuel Lewis
detailedReviews.text: This is only for the mall of America location! Very rude staff! Pizza is very much overpriced! You buy a 10 inch pizza and it‚Äôs 7 inches for 18$. I‚Äôll never spend another dollar at slice bros pizza ‚Ä¶. I tried to support a black owned business but their prices have gotten ridiculous over the years

detailedReviews.author: Ra√∫l M
detailedReviews.text: Good slice.  But too expensive.  In NYC, nobody would pay these prices for a slice.    Why is Minneapolis paying so much?   3 stars.    If reasonably priced... 5 stars.

detailedReviews.author: kennis littleton
detailedReviews.text: Today was my second time coming to the slice location at global market, and also the second time that they only had one soda selection which was diet Pepsi, on top of that the cashier was Rude and even aggressive he was on the Phone the whole time

detailedReviews.author: Frederick The Planespotter
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly staff. Good pizza, ok drink selection. Pretty good, recommended.

detailedReviews.author: Carol Brown
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in Nola. mibn

detailedReviews.author: Steve Nieckarz
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and great service. This is probably one of the best non-Minnesota style pizza joints in town. Crust has flavor and texture much like a New York-style slice. Try the pickle slice. It'll knock your socks off.

detailedReviews.author: Black Son
detailedReviews.text: Took ~50 mins to get food

detailedReviews.author: enoch p
detailedReviews.text: The pizza - just ok. Brought my two sons. One agreed with that. The other loved it. The pizza server was excellent. The cashier guy on the other hand was super crabby and DID NOT want to be there - which made for not a good experience. I had high expectations based on everything I‚Äôve read. I really dislike giving reviews like this but felt it was warranted.

detailedReviews.author: Ryan
detailedReviews.text:
I love pizza.  I love pizza by the slice.

This place does that! $5 for a slice as big as a plate.

Today I got a chicken bacon ranch slice. Usually I go for pepperoni as it never lets me down but I wanted to switch it up today. The crust was buttery and crispy. It folded in half just the way I like it after I dashed on some red pepper flakes.

You can buy Whole pizza if you like I just didn't look into that today.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Fredrick
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: G F
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, fantastic value and the owners are super friendly and helpful !

detailedReviews.author: Erik Rosenberger
detailedReviews.text: Every single time I order from here they fail. Open til 7pm and at 5:15 they are closed. Worst ‚Äúwanna be brothers‚Äù pizza joint. Just game as hell

detailedReviews.author: akilah
detailedReviews.text: I loved this place for the crispy slices. Today they were soggy and honestly tasted a day old ü•≤ hopefully today was just a bad day. I‚Äôll be back!

detailedReviews.author: Noelle Vertina
detailedReviews.text: Our new go to pizza spot. I love that you can order single slices for delivery, the dill pickle pizza is soooo good!

detailedReviews.author: Casey Porche
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is so good. If they have it, get their Dill pizza. üòç

detailedReviews.author: K ‚ÄúKimmy‚Äù D
detailedReviews.text: 100% recommend Slice. I ordered 3rd party and they called to confirm my changes on the order. Customer service wow! The pizza? Couldn‚Äôt ask for better this is the real deal.

detailedReviews.author: Youngin Get A Trade Phila
detailedReviews.text: Would have been 5 stars, but need some more non-pork options.

detailedReviews.author: R C.
detailedReviews.text: Found this place online. Got the two slice special with a drink (2 slices of pepperoni). The pizza was thin and crispy and similar to a New York style pizza. However not exactly on the level of that. Still a great price and much better than a chain pizza would be.

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Guffan
detailedReviews.text: Damn delicious, fresh, high quality, quick

detailedReviews.author: Priscilla S.
detailedReviews.text: Delicious and fresh ingredients.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.4/5 rating from 47 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the unique dill pickle pizza, describing it as a must-try that they dream about daily. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The ability to order single slices for delivery is highly appreciated, offering convenience and flexibility to customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The staff consistently provide friendly and superior customer service, going the extra mile to meet customer needs. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and order inaccuracies - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Poor customer service and staff rudeness - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
